TheSecretHistories:RiteToolConsumeFollow.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 12 tsh:Forge 8 tsh:Grail NL 移除自身的所有负面效果.
TheSecretHistories:RiteToolConsumeFollow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain NL Exhaust 12 tsh:Forge 8 tsh:Grail NL 移除自身的所有负面效果.

TheSecretHistories:RiteToolConsumeIngred.NAME: 海飨仪式
TheSecretHistories:RiteToolConsumeIngred.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 12 tsh:Moth 8 tsh:Edge NL 每回合额外gain  [E] .
TheSecretHistories:RiteToolConsumeIngred.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 12 tsh:Moth 8 tsh:Edge NL 每回合额外gain  [E] [E] .

TheSecretHistories:SpiritWinterMoth.NAME: 无声亡者
TheSecretHistories:SpiritWinterMoth.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL Apply自身的 tsh:Moth 等量的 tsh:Winter NL Exhaust 所有 tsh:Moth .
TheSecretHistories:SpiritWinterMoth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL Apply自身的 tsh:Moth !M! 倍的 tsh:Winter NL Exhaust 所有 tsh:Moth .

TheSecretHistories:SpiritLanternEdge.NAME: 迹形
TheSecretHistories:SpiritLanternEdge.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL 抽满手牌,每抽一张牌对所有敌人Deal !D! damage..

TheSecretHistories:SpiritForgeMoth.NAME: 汽灵
TheSecretHistories:SpiritForgeMoth.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL Deal !D! damage..在手牌中添加一张此牌的复制品.

TheSecretHistories:SpiritGrailMoth.NAME: 原生先知
TheSecretHistories:SpiritGrailMoth.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL 让目标在本场战斗中额外受到50%×X倍的damage.
TheSecretHistories:SpiritGrailMoth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL 让目标在本场战斗中额外受到50%×(X+1)倍的damage.

TheSecretHistories:SpiritHeartEdge.NAME: 擂击者
TheSecretHistories:SpiritHeartEdge.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL Deal !D! damage.,gain 等量 Strength 和 敏捷 .

TheSecretHistories:SpiritWinterEdge.NAME: 镜中少女
TheSecretHistories:SpiritWinterEdge.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL Deal目标攻击意图双倍的damage（根据怪物damage基础值计算）. NL Retain .
TheSecretHistories:SpiritWinterEdge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL Deal目标攻击意图三倍的damage（根据怪物damage基础值计算）. NL Retain .

TheSecretHistories:SpiritGrailEdge.NAME: 第二干渴者伊泽姆
TheSecretHistories:SpiritGrailEdge.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL 将一名敌人变为 tsh:其他敌人 .
TheSecretHistories:SpiritGrailEdge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL 将一名敌人变为 tsh:其他敌人 并继 承其 Hp比例.

TheSecretHistories:SummonGrailEdge.NAME: Summon 第二干渴者伊泽姆

TheSecretHistories:SpiritForgeEdge.NAME: 坩埚王
TheSecretHistories:SpiritForgeEdge.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL 对所有敌人Deal !M! 的XTimes幂damage.

TheSecretHistories:SpiritLanternSecret.NAME: 特蕾莎
TheSecretHistories:SpiritLanternSecret.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL Ethereal. NL this turn所有 tsh: Principles 临时增加 !M! 层.

TheSecretHistories:Restlessness.NAME: restlessness
TheSecretHistories:Restlessness.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . NL 进入弃牌堆时,将 !M! 张恐惧加入弃牌堆.

TheSecretHistories:Dread.NAME: 恐惧
TheSecretHistories:Dread.DESCRIPTION: 进入弃牌堆时,每回合Lose !M!临时 Strength .

TheSecretHistories:Fascination.NAME: 入迷
TheSecretHistories:Fascination.DESCRIPTION: 进入弃牌堆时,每回合Lose !M!临时 敏捷 .

TheSecretHistories:Rumour.NAME: 古怪的传闻
TheSecretHistories:Rumour.DESCRIPTION: 将一张随机 tsh:追随者 加入手牌. NL 这张牌在this turn耗能变为0.
TheSecretHistories:Rumour.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain NL 将一张随机 tsh:追随者 加入手牌. NL 这张牌在this turn耗能变为0.
